posts.post_content:
Protection only protects them from getting targeted or receiving any damage. just as creatures with protection from white are destroyed by [Wrath of God](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wrath of God), they are also affected by Moat.  
  
This card is an ultimate response to about any aggro deck (except for Fearie aggro-control maybe).  
[Teferi's Moat](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Teferi's Moat) is a decent remake of that card and most notably does not prevent *you* from attacking.
posts.html:
Protection only protects them from getting targeted or receiving any damage. just as creatures with protection from white are destroyed by Wrath of God, they are also affected by Moat.

This card is an ultimate response to about any aggro deck (except for Fearie aggro-control maybe).
Teferi's Moat is a decent remake of that card and most notably does not prevent you from attacking.

Posted By: wholelottalove (9/29/2012 9:21:00 AM)

posts.post_content:
so just wanting to point out the moat + humility combo  
unlike most combos in magic both pieces are actually quite considerably awesome all on their own  
humility makes all creatures 1/1 and lose all abilities (flying + those creatures your opponent cares to use its ability more than to attack with)  
moat since no creatures have flying anymore, purely awesome  
im currently making a deck with this combo + iso chant + enlightened tutor + such things  
& then 1 emrakul to be impervious to mill & i sit there in a lock till they deck themselves
posts.html:
